messages.body:
Dear Mariam,

as I am currently away from home travelling a lot with a tight schedule due to
the current pre-mission inflight training program, which is taking place at
Baikonur, Khazakstan. I don't have access to a phone here and I'm sure NASA
monitors us Astronauts pretty closely given the
fact, that it is only two month until the upcoming Mars mission is going to be
launched. As I understand it, this transaction is supposed to be kept
confidential and so we wouldn't want my employers to investigate into this
matter now, would we? I therefore advise that we refrain
from using a telephone for the time being.
I can access a fax, though. The number is: 1-309-xxx-xxxx.
Tell your son Mustapha that he can contact me either via email or fax.
Keep the good faith!

Your Friend

Lad Hunter

messages.body:
Dearest Mariam,

I feel somewhat compelled by your tone. What do you mean by: "ACT
ACCORCONDILY"?
Even though I know that you are of noble Afreakin heritage, you should know who
you are dealing with and that I'm not to be fooled around with.
Now, before you order me to go to Longdon, make sure your son introduces
himself in a proper way. Let me show you how we do this in my parts:

Please allow me to introduce myself.
I'm a man of wealth and taste.
I've been around for a long, long year.
And I was around when Isa Wanker had her moment of doubt and pain!
Made damn sure that Pilate washed his hands and sealed his fate!
I rode a tank, held a general's rank when the Blitzkrieg raged and the bodies
stank.
Just as every cop is a criminal and all the sinners saints.
As heads is tails, just call me Lad Hunter, cause I'm in need of some
restraint.

Now please, as eager as I am to help you, I gave you a fax number and I also
gave you a reason why I couldn't talk to you on the phone! Reread my earlier
message, if you didn't get the point! I'm with NASA, they get pretty itchy when
a  high profile mission like our mission to
Mars could be jeopardized!
If you want me to, I'll attach for you a scan of my NASA identification card in
the next email.
Please, send me some proof of identification as well.

And one more thing. Release the caps lock button on your keyboard, for I don't
like to be shouted at.
I am a distinguished personality in my society with an outstanding reputation.
Did I mention to you before, that I have a degree in high energy gabloonzian
singularity engineering? Well that should surely ring a bell, so may I politely
ask that you treat me with all due respect
and don't simply "order" me to do things. I will then help you in any way
heavenly possible, I promise.
I want you to understand that I truly am your friend.
As a proof of my friendship towards you, I ask you to please address me as Lad
Hunter, not Ladislav. All my dear friends call me Lad Hunter.

Your true friend

Lad Hunter

I did mail you. what else do you need from me? You have my fax number, so the
ball is in your court now.
I'll be off for a parabola flight tomorrow testing the ships flux-compensators
during hyperthermiatrical stasis reticulation in the lower orbit.
But what am I telling you. You now how it is. You've seen one endoplasmatic
cataclyptical reversion and you've seen them all.

Now please, remember to fill me in on the details asap!
Oh, yes. One more thing: I want you to call me "Lad Hunter", not the formal

that later... I'd love to see a picture of you. How old are you anyways? Do you
want to see a picture of me?

Your true Friend

Lad Hunter

messages.subject: Welcome back!
messages.body:
Ok Mariam,

that's fine. I'll let you know if the fax arrived. One more thing: do you have
any sort of identification you could scan and send me? I will provide you with
my own ID as well if you would like me to. It would strengthen my confidence in
this transaction to know that the person
I'm dealing with is real, if you know what I mean. After all, the world is a
bad place and full of crooky people. Thanks in advance my dear Lady.

By the way, the lower orbit tests of the new flux compensators were a complete
success and me and the rest of the crew are on leave for a week. I'll be
spending that week with my old pal Bilbo Baggins at his home at the Shire. He
is a very close friend who even wrote a book about
my space flight experiences. The book is called "There and Back Again" and I
will scan the cover and email it to you. I'll ask Mr. Baggins to approach his
publisher for a special hardcover edition copy which I shall personally sign
and send to you.
I don't have access to the internet at Mr.Baggins' house. You know, he's a
little old fashioned in some ways. However, I'll be checking my mail at an
internet cafe.

Your friend

Lad Hunter

messages.body:
Wow! Mariam!

That looks like a lot of money in that picture!! I can smell that beaver
(money) coming from far away!
Unfortunately I will be off for testing again during the next couple of days.
This time it's going to be in the higher orbit, where we'll conduct some
discombobulate leiotrichiousity testing of the rhopalic snollygoster of the
birectangular synopsys. I'm sorry if this sounds too scientific to you, but I'm
all excited about the perspective of going to Mars.

Me and my crew, we have been behaving like little children at the prospect of
inducing sabermetrician calabimitularity at conditions of zero gravity.
Can you imagine that?!
Well, the only possible setback could come from a severe increase of a sunburst
induced  hebesphenomegacorona activities. well, this is a Mars atmosphere
phenomenon best compared to increased particle beams hitting the earth
atmosphere from the aurora coriolis caused by a slight
poleshift of the sun.
I'm sorry Mariam! I tend to drift off on these topics. I truly live for
science! However, I will not forget that I have dedicated myself to helping you
out.
I promise, everything will go according to plan.
I am able to email you during the oncoming mission (june 27th through july
1st), but I must tell you in advance that communication might be impaired from
particle jets hitting the transmitter units.

Your true (excited) friend

Lad Hunter

[As the astute reader may suspect, this picture has been altered here at Scam-o-Editorial. Small simians and dogs have gone into space but NASA are not yet sending up moose because, Bullwinkle's kindly reputation to the contrary, they are too short-tempered for extended teamwork in cramped quarters. "Lad's" photo was that of astronaut and US Navy Capt. Kenneth Bowersox, who looked much more convincing than a moose. We felt shy about using the captain's photo (after all, would you want your picture here?) but you can learn more about his career chez NASA.
And now back to our regularly scheduled scam.]

My dear Mrs. Mariam,
I have received your sons fax. He has told me about the lawyer, barrister Obi.
I prepared a paper which I tried to fax to the lawyer, but I constantly get an
automated voice message saying: "The service you requested is not available at
present". I checked my machine on a different number and it worked fine. It
might be due to the fact, that this was not my
own machine as I'm abroad as I told you. Maybe the machine doesn't allow long
distance connections. I have attached the paper for the lawyer, though and am
still able to receive faxes via my webbased fax-forwarding service.
Please tell your son Mustapha to get in touch with me via email and tell me the
lawyers email address as it hasn't been provided to me yet.

Thank you and kind regards

Your families friend

messages.body:
Dear James,

I will book a flight to London as soon as I get the documents from you.
I must ask you for one small thing, though. I want you to make sure that
I am picked up at the airport and I need to know the person that is
going to pick me up. As a scientist, I hate any kind of uncertainties.
Please have the person that is going to pick me up have his/her picture
taken, holding a sign with my name on it and then scan and send it to
me. I'm very serious about this. I can't tell you any details, but it
might be connected to the fact that I got lost at the Harrods department
store in London when I was a kid. I was only five years old and I waited
for three hours for my parents to collect me from lost and found. I
still have a trauma from this experience and my psychoanalyst says that
any similar experience could trigger a paraplectic dactylonomy which is,
in a way, similar to epileptic spasms of the lower maritorious
abstracticus.
So please, my friend, I can not travel without this reassurance, as I
will break into a cold sweat at the mere thought of arriving at a
strange place with no one to take care of me.
Also, I will be carrying a large amount of cash (30.000$ to cover any
unexpected expenditure. A fact that doesn't help easing my mind, if you
know what I mean!
So please take that into consideration and advise them (the security
company) of this special problem of mine. I don't want to do it myself,
because it somewhat embarrasses me.
Take care!

Your friend

Lad Hunter

suffering from. The splinter it threatening to punctuate my left lung.
It's a souvenir from my tour of duty at Da Nang in Vietnam when me and
Strawberry got lost and ambushed on a night patrol. Charly had us
surrounded and my weapon jammed while Strawberry was still cappin' them
VC until he ran outta ammo. That's when I whipped out my chopsticks.
Ten seconds later, three VC were dead. Then that mortar granade
struck a tree only fifteen feet away. The next thing I remember is
waking up at the military hospital with the buttugly hairyass nurse
giving me an enema. Strawberry didn't make it.
Still, things could have been worse if I didn't have a third degree
Iguanodon in Fok Yu Kung Fu. I owe my life to my late grandmaster Yu Suk
Man. If it wasn't for him, I would have been toast.
Anyway, This means that I'll be in hospital for the next three or four
days. So please be patient if you don't hear anything from me until
then. Please inform Mariam that I am well and the security company of
that slight delay.

Your friend

Lad Hunter

messages.body:
Hello Mrs. Abacha,

I think you know who I am as Lad has told me about you and also
mentioned me in his emails to you, I believe. However, bear with him as
he is undergoing some serious surgery and he needs all the support he
can get from his friends right now. He told me about how much he is
determined to help you. I have, as he told you I would, contacted my
publisher and he provided me with a special edition of the book I wrote
about Lad. The title is "There and Back Again". I attached a scan of the
cover and will send you the copy signed by Mr. Hunter as soon as his
current condition improves and I get to visit him at the hospital. He is
really fond of you, you know?
There still is this issue that stands in the way of him travelling to
London, however. I think he understated the whole issue when telling the
lawyer about it, because it embarrasses him, but he will under no
circumstance be able to travel to London without seeing a picture of the
person who is going to pick him up with a sign with his name on it. I
know this might sound strange to you, but it is a psychological problem
he's had since his early childhood. He tried to tell the lawyer,
Barrister Obi, about it, but I think Barrister Obi doesn't understand.
Lad had his things packed and the money to meet any expenses for
claiming the consignment ready (even though I think 30,000US$ is a
little too much), when the doctor told him about the severe state he is
in. Anyways, he left the money with me and I'm expected to pass it back
to him when he is released from the clinic. He will be ready to travel
as soon as that moment arrives. If he hasn't seen the picture of the
person picking him up, he won't travel. I'm 100% sure of this, even
though I know how much he likes you and how much he is willing to help
you out. Please speak to the barrister and make this very well
understood.

Warm Regards

Bilbo Baggins
The Book Cover!

messages.body:
My dear Mariam,
please do not worry about Mr. Hunter. He's going to be released from
hospital on tuesday as the surgery went quite well! They were able to
remove the shrapnel that was threatening to punctuate his lung. He will
probably be able to travel before the weekend and I have already
arranged with him to pass the money back, as he felt uncomfortable at
the thought of taking the 30,000$ to the hospital as you know and gave
the 30 grand to me. Still, what are you going to do about the picture
issue. It should be very easy to do. Just get anyone to take a picture
of himself holding up that damn sign with "Mr. Lad Hunter" written on it
and he'll be fine with travelling. It doesn't even matter if it's the
same person that picks him up (don't tell him I told you!), but at least
that will reassure him and he will go.
I have to go now. I have to check on my nephew Frodo who's probably out
in the woods with his pal Samwise and they are up to no good, I'm sure.
Warmest regards
Bilbo Baggins

messages.body:
Dear Mrs. Mariam,
I am sorry that I didn't respond right away, as I spent last night at
Elrond's house, who is an old friend of mine. We talked about the days
of old and had a merry good time and one or two brandies while blowing
smoke rings into the night sky.
I have good news! Mr. Hunter is going to be released from Hospital
tommorrow afternoon, and the doctor says he is ok to travel on friday.
If that is a problem (because of the security company being closed over
the weekend and such), please inform me and we will delay his travels
until the beginning of next week. Please remember to send the requested
picture to Lad directly, as he is so excited about going to London to
complete this transaction and this, as I told you is the only issue that
stands in the way of him doing so right now. He asked me if I think that
he should buy a present to send to you, and I said that I don't know. So
if you can think of anything you'd like - a watch, a laptop computer, a
cellphone - please let me know and I'll give him a hint. You are really
a sympathetic lady and I enjoy communicating with you, even though I
don't really know you.
I'll take care of Lad's travel schedule and will let you and him know
the details as soon as you confirm that you'd like him to travel this
friday. 
My regards to you and all your family
Your servant
Bilbo Baggins of the Shire

for is following orders. I shall discuss this issue with him at once as
soon as he arrives in London, which should be in about 5 hours from now.
Don't get nervous, everything is gonna be ok, right?
Regards
Bilbo

messages.body:
Dear Dr.Obi,

please allow me to introduce myself. I am Dr.Karl-Emmanuell Hodenlos
of Bollocks, Hodenlos & Schleim, legal counsels to the late Ladislav
Hunter. Mr.Baggins kindly passed me your email address.

Let me first express my deepest condolences to you and Mrs.Abacha. It
is a terrible tragedy that happened a few days ago and we all will miss
the late Ladislav Hunter. As you know he was a very nice man and will be
missed.

Dear colleague, it is my duty to inform you that the name of your
client Mrs. Mariam Hajia Abacha is on the list of persons who are mentioned
in Ladislav Hunter's latest testament he made shortly before his surgery
a few weeks ago. In a matter of fact, Mrs.Abacha was provided for quite
generously with a significant sum and a piece of real estate.

For legal reasons I can't give you more details before the official
opening of the testament which will happen on the 31st of July here. From
what I know it is currently not possible for Mrs.Abacha to leave the country so somebody else has to attend the opening in her name.

If it is impossible for you to employ a representative to the
proceeding then I could of course act on your and your client's behalf. Under those circumstances I'd need a power of attorney signed by you and
Mrs.Abacha and equipped with your official seals and stamps, together with a copy of your international passport to prove your identity for the court's testament registry.

Please contact me soon so that we can discuss the further handling.
You can reach me either under this email address, by fax +49-30-11833 or by 
telephone +49-30-11836. In case you are wondering about these German
numbers let me tell you that Bollocks, Hodenlos & Schleim is an international law firm with offices in Los Angeles, London and Berlin. During the current vacation of the Senior I am taking care of the personal-related issues including reading of the will from the Berlin office. Mr.Hunter's testament is registered with the court here too.

I'd like to hear from you soon.

Sincerely,

Dr.Karl-Emmanuel Hodenlos
--
Bollocks, Hodenlos & Schleim
Rechtsanwälte seit 1952
Berlin Ð IAAL

messages.body:
Dear colleague,

Thank you for your email. In fact I was waiting the whole day for a
call from you but of course without success. After receiving your
message I tried to call you under the number you gave me but already
after the country prefix I've got an error message indicating problems
somewhere between Europe and Africa. Please try it again tomorrow.

Meanwhile I will give you a more detailed description of the
modalities
regarding the opening of Mr.Hunter's last will. It will take place on
the 31st of July at 10am at the Amstsgericht Berlin-Charlottenburg
where his testament has been registered by me. Several of the
beneficiaries will appear in person for the opening, other send a
legal
representative and some will be represented by me.

I have learned from Mr.Baggins that Mrs.Abacha is currently in a
rather
unfortunate relationship with the Nigerian government. I think it
would
be wise under those circumstances to conceal her involvement as much
as
possible to protect the safety of your client. Therefore I'd advise
you
to set up two power of attorney forms. In the first you let Mrs.Abacha
state that you are acting on her behalf and in the second you transfer
this area of your competence to me. It is a very simple but effective
method to withheld Mrs.Abacha's name from the final property transfer
because those documents will only bear your name then.

An international passport or a valid national identification is
required for the power of attorney. In certain cases a driver's
license
is also possible to be used. For example, many people in the United
States don't have a passport and just use their driver's license for
identification purposes. Because you will probably come over to
Germany
in the future for the final stages of the heritage transaction a
passport is advised.

Please send me the PoA forms as soon as possible before the 31st. If
you don't have your new passport until then please add a copy of your
national ID. My address for the second form is the following:

Dr.Karl-Emmanuell Hodenlos
Sophien-Friedhof II, Bergstr. 29, 10115 Berlin, Germany

To speed up the negotiation and avoid additional delay by a
translation
you can copy the following German standard paragraph to your PoA. It
states that I will act on the behalf of you and your client in this
case.

"Hiermit übertrage ich, Dr.James Obi, meine gesamten
geschäftlichen
Befugnisse auf Dr.Karl-Emmanuell Hodenlos von jetzt an auf immerdar.
Er hat damit vollen Zugriff auf mein Eigentum und das aller meiner
Klienten, egal wer und wo, und kann damit komplett nach seinem Willen
verfahren. Diese Vollmacht kann nicht widerrufen werde. Ferner
erklre ich, mich jetzt im absoluten Vollbesitz meiner geistigen
Kräfte zu befinden, stocknchtern zu sein und dies freiwillig zu
schreiben."

I'd be glad to hear from you soon.

Sincerely,

Dr.Karl-Emmanuell Hodenlos
--
Bollocks, Hodenlos & Schleim
Rechtsanwälte seit 1952
Berlin Ð IAAL

Dr.Karl-Emmanuell Hodenlos

--
Bollocks, Hodenlos & Schleim
Rechtsanwälte seit 1952
Berlin Ð IAAL

My dear best good friend James!
I am so happy about the fact that I am allowed to carry out this transaction as my friend, no, my BROTHER as I should call him after all he has done for me, Lad, would have most certainly wanted me to do!
Since I have learned, that the chambers of Mr. Bollocks O«Steele have instructed their european branch, Bollocks, Hodenlos & Schleim to arrange the opening of will of our dear Lad, I feel a great deal of relief, as they have an untarnished reputation of being amongst the best legal advisors to be found anywhere in Europe.
Please, call me as soon as possible. My UK number being: 00 44 7092032117
If you don«t catch me, most likely I am at the nearby River Kwai with Tom Bombadil fishing for largemouth basses and Ichtyosaurs. Leave a message with all the detailed information I will need on my answering machine if need be.
Humbly
Bilbo Baggins of the Shire

I am still waiting for you to send the two PoA forms and your and
your client's identification. Without these documents I cannot send you
copies of the relevant pages of Mr.Hunter's testament and tell you more details of it. "Auri sacra fames", you understand.

As I already wrote you, the opening of the testament is scheduled for
10am today. And following the rule of "literae non erubescent"
Mrs.Abacha would have to be excluded today and her part postponed until next week when I hopefully can present the necessary power of attorney (PoA) and identification to the judge.

If you don't want to cause any further delay please finish the
documents, add the German paragraph I sent you and email them together with the passports/IDs mentioned in my previous mail to this address. There
are still more than three hours left and it should be in the best interest of your client to complete this heritage transaction as fast as possible.

Otherwise I'll have to get a new appointment with the judge next week
again to register your client's heritage claim.

Sincerely,

Dr.Karl-Emmanuell Hodenlos

messages.body:
Dear James,
what has happened? I haven«t heard from you in three days! Is everything alright? I would like to know how we will proceed. I have just returned from an appointment with Dr. Smaug and he told me that I couldn«t travel at the moment, due to my high blood pressure. So if I am required to travel soon, I might have to send my nephew Frodo. He«s a bit dim, but a good guy. He wouldn«t know any details, I«d just give him the money and send him to Ghana to pay for the demurrage fees and to pick up the consignment. He would not open the boxes and will never know what is inside them.
Please, urgently inform me if the consignment has arrived in Ghana yet.
Your friend
Bilbo
PS: I want to inform you that I will change my email provider, as I am not satisfied with this one anymore. They have too much technical downtime, as I wasn«t able to access my account for almost two days. Can you recommend a good provider? Thanks.

messages.body:
Dear James,
I am sincerely worried about you and Mariam. I hope the authorities don«t trouble you. I don«t see any other reason for you not getting back to me. I spoke with Lad«s lawyer who is still waiting for the PoA from you. If I don«t hear from you in the next three days, I will hire a group of Gurkha mercenaries to search for you and the money. I still have very good contacts in the military from the time when I was serving in her Majesties 7th Royal Gurkha Brigade. I will bring Oin, Gloin, Balin, Thorin, Gandalf and the rest of the bunch!
"KAPHAR HUNNU BHANDA MORNU RAMRO CHHAA!" This is Gurkha and means: "It is better to die than live a coward."
Don«t worry! Everything will be fine! I will bring my trustworthy band of Gurkha with sharpened Sirupati Kukri's with me on this expedition at the end of which you and Mariam shall walk freely again.
If I don«t hear from you until then, my party will set off in the early morning hours four days from now. Because I will be bringing two fully equipped heavy machine gunners, we will not be able to enter the country by normal means of transportation, but parachute out of a small turbo prop just outside the capital. We will then split into two groups and circle the town halfways in opposing directions. On wednesday 130203, 0600 dildo time, we will launch a surprise attack on the capital from two different sides, ultimately driving a wedge between the defenders. In a swift strike we will take the administration district and seize control over the government. Then we will constitute you as the new head of state. What you think? Sounds good? Ok! Let me hear from you or else WE ARE GOING IN!
Your brother in arms
Bilbo
